text: Matthew Marinelli (born March 20, 1985) is an American professional wrestler. He currently wrestles for All Elite Wrestling (AEW) and their sister promotion Ring of Honor (ROH) under the ring name Matt Taven. He is a member of The Undisputed Kingdom stable. Taven has also made appearances in Ring of Honor (ROH) (before AEW's buyout), New Japan Pro-Wrestling (NJPW), Consejo Mundial de Lucha Libre (CMLL), and Impact Wrestling. Taven has won many championships over the course of his career. In CMLL, Taven was a one-time NWA World Historic Welterweight Champion. In Impact, he was a one-time Impact World Tag Team Champion. In NJPW, he was a one-time IWGP Tag Team Champion. In ROH, he is a one-time ROH World Champion, one-time ROH World Television Champion, three-time ROH World Tag Team Champion, three time and first ROH World Six-Man Tag Team Champion, the winner of the Top Prospect Tournament in 2013 and ROH World Six-Man Tag Team Championship Tournament in 2016, and is a Fifth Triple Crown Champion, as well as a Second Grand Slam Champion. ==Career== ===All Elite Wrestling / Ring of Honor === On the October 14, 2022 episode of Rampage, Taven made his AEW alongside Mike Bennett and Maria Kanellis. On the October 28 episode of Rampage, Taven challenged Wardlow for his AEW TNT Championship but was unsuccessful. At Supercard of Honor, Taven and Bennett entered the "Reach for the Sky" ladder match in an attempt to win the vacant ROH World Tag Team Championships but the match was won by The Lucha Brothers (Penta El Zero Miedo and Rey FÃ©nix). At Death Before Dishonor, Taven and Bennett challenged for the ROH World Tag Team Championship in a four-way tag team match but it was won by Aussie Open (Kyle Fletcher and Mark Davis). In December 2023, Taven and Bennett wore masks and were called "The Devil's Masked Men". At New Year's Smash, they both defeated MJF in a handicap match to win the ROH World Tag Team Championship. At Worlds End, Taven and Bennett were revealed as the masked men and they created the Undisputed Kingdom stable, alongside Adam Cole, Roderick Strong, and Wardlow. At Battle of the Belts XI, The Undisputed Kingdom challenged The Sons of Texas (Dustin Rhodes, Marshall Von Erich, and Ross Von Erich) for the vacant ROH World Six-Man Tag Team Championships but were unsuccessful. On the August 17 episode of Collision, The Undisputed Kingdom lost the ROH World Tag Team Championships to Dustin Rhodes and Sammy Guevara. On the September 21 episode of Collision, Taven and Bennett challenged Sons of Texas to a rematch for the ROH World Tag Team Title in a Bunkhouse Brawl but lost. On the October 3 episode of ROH on HonorClub, Taven challenged Mark Briscoe for his ROH World Championship but was unsuccessful. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:All Elite Wrestling people Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Sportspeople from New Hampshire Category:Total Nonstop Action Wrestling alumni
title: Matt Taven
